entry.title: volo 0.2.5 released
entry.content:
This update for volo is mostly about working well with the new GitHub rate limit changes for unauthenticated requests. 0.2.5 will use GitHub auth tokens if the non-token API limit has been reached.

The other benefit with this approach, you can now pull down private repos via volo create and volo add!

It is strongly recommended you upgrade to 0.2.5:

npm install -g volo

List of fixed 0.2.5 issues.

entry.title: volo 0.2.4 released
entry.content:
Just a small update for volo, but it adds a simple volo info command and includes an alias for install that points to add.

It also fixes an edge case bug that is bad enough that you should upgrade to 0.2.4 as soon as possible.

npm install -g volo

List of fixed 0.2.4 issues.
